alert.note: Alert for Buckeye, Avondale; North Phoenix, Glendale; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 3:38PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 430 PM MST... At 338 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Estrella Mountain Park, or near Avondale, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Avondale, Goodyear, Tolleson, Cashion, Litchfield Park, Phoenix International Raceway, Estrella Mountain Park, Estrella Mountain Ranch, and Rainbow Valley. This includes the following highways... AZ Route 101 near mile marker 2. AZ Route 303 between mile markers 105 and 106. This includes AZ Interstate 10 between 124 and 140. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Buckeye, Avondale; North Phoenix, Glendale; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument
